name: Bulbasaur
flavorText: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.flavorText: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
abilities.shortEffect: Doubles Speed during strong sunlight.
effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.
This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.flavorText: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Attack by two stages.

moves.name: Grassy Terrain
moves.effect: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.

moves.name: Work Up
moves.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

moves.name: Grass Pledge
moves.effect: With Fire Pledgefire-pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.

moves.name: Echoed Voice
moves.effect: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

moves.name: Round
moves.effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.effect: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Grass Knot
moves.effect: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.flavorText: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
moves.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

moves.name: Power Whip
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Leaf Storm
moves.effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

moves.name: Petal Dance
moves.flavorText: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
moves.effect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.flavorText: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.
moves.effect: Reduces damage from special attacks by 50% for five turns.

moves.name: Sludge
moves.flavorText: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: Skull Bash
moves.flavorText: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.flavorText: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Special Defense by two stages.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Curse
moves.flavorText: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.
moves.effect: Ghosts pay half their max HP to hurt the target every turn.  Others decrease Speed but raise Attack and Defense.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.flavorText: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
moves.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

moves.name: Endure
moves.flavorText: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

moves.name: Charm
moves.flavorText: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers its Attack stat.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Energy Ball
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.effect: Protects the user's field from major status ailments and confusion for five turns.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.effect: Never misses.

moves.name: Grass Whistle
moves.effect: Puts the target to sleep.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.effect: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Nature Power
moves.effect: Uses a move which depends upon the terrain.

moves.name: Nature Power
moves.effect: Uses a move which depends upon the terrain.

moves.name: Ingrain
moves.effect: Prevents the user from leaving battle.  User regains 1/16 of its max HP every turn.

moves.name: Confide
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Growl
moves.flavorText: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

moves.name: Leech Seed
moves.flavorText: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.
moves.effect: Seeds the target, stealing HP from it every turn.

moves.name: Vine Whip
moves.flavorText: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Sleep Powder
moves.flavorText: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.
moves.effect: Puts the target to sleep.

moves.name: Poison Powder
moves.flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.
moves.effect: Poisons the target.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.flavorText: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.flavorText: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
moves.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.effect: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Growth
moves.flavorText: The user’s body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: Worry Seed
moves.effect: Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.

moves.name: Synthesis
moves.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.

moves.name: Seed Bomb
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

name: Ivysaur
flavorText: There is a bud on this Pokémon’s back. To support its weight, Ivysaur’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.

moves.flavorText: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.
moves.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

moves.name: Round
moves.effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

moves.name: Flame Charge
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Shadow Claw
moves.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.flavorText: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Dragon Rush
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Belly Drum
moves.flavorText: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.
moves.effect: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.flavorText: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
moves.effect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by one stage.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.flavorText: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Attack by two stages.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.effect: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage.

moves.name: Beat Up
moves.effect: Hits once for every conscious Pokémon the trainer has.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.effect: Burns the target.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.effect: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

moves.name: Air Cutter
moves.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

moves.name: Overheat
moves.effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

moves.name: Rock Tomb
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.effect: Never misses.

moves.name: Dragon Claw
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Dragon Dance
moves.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Fling
moves.effect: Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.effect: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.flavorText: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Growl
moves.flavorText: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

moves.name: Ember
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.flavorText: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

moves.name: Dragon Rage
moves.flavorText: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.
moves.effect: Inflicts 40 points of damage.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.flavorText: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.

moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Flame Burst
moves.effect: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.

moves.name: Slash
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.
moves.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.flavorText: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.flavorText: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.
moves.effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

moves.name: Inferno
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.

name: Charmeleon
flavorText: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.

moves.effect: Resets all Pokémon's stats, accuracy, and evasion.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.flavorText: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Aqua Jet
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Flail
moves.flavorText: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move’s power.
moves.effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.

moves.name: Aura Sphere
moves.effect: Never misses.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.flavorText: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.
moves.effect: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it's a Ghost.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Aqua Ring
moves.effect: Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP each turn.

moves.name: Fling
moves.effect: Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item.

moves.name: Brine
moves.effect: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last special hit it took.

moves.name: Fake Out
moves.effect: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle.  Causes the target to flinch.

moves.name: Hail
moves.effect: Changes the weather to a hailstorm for five turns.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

moves.name: Yawn
moves.effect: Target sleeps at the end of the next turn.

moves.name: Refresh
moves.effect: Cleanses the user of a burn, paralysis, or poison.

moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.effect: Halves all Electric-type damage.

moves.name: Rock Tomb
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Water Spout
moves.effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.

moves.name: Muddy Water
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.effect: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.

moves.name: Tackle

moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.flavorText: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.flavorText: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Withdraw

moves.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.

name: Wartortle
flavorText: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as Wartortle ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon’s toughness as a battler.

abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

name: Caterpie
flavorText: Perhaps because it would like to grow up quickly, it has a voracious appetite, eating a hundred leaves a day.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.flavorText: This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
abilities.shortEffect: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.
effect: This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.

An extra effect is a move's chance, listed as an "effect chance", to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, thunder-shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder-wave's is not, nor are knock-off's item removal and air-cutter's increased critical hit rate.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.flavorText: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
abilities.shortEffect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.
effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: String Shot
moves.flavorText: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.effect: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.

name: Metapod
flavorText: Its shell is filled with a thick liquid. All of the cells throughout its body are being rebuilt in preparation for evolution.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.
abilities.shortEffect: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.
effect: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.

moves.flavorText: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.

abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon’s compound eyes boost its accuracy.
abilities.shortEffect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.3×.
effect: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their accuracy.
This ability has no effect on the one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn-drill, and sheer-cold).
Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, the chance of a wild Pokémon holding a particular item is raised from 50%, 5%, or 1% to 60%, 20%, or 5%, respectively.

moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Thief

moves.name: Sleep Talk

name: Weedle
flavorText: Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.flavorText: This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
abilities.shortEffect: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.
effect: This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.

An extra effect is a move's chance, listed as an "effect chance", to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, thunder-shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder-wave's is not, nor are knock-off's item removal and air-cutter's increased critical hit rate.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.flavorText: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
abilities.shortEffect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.
effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

name: Kakuna
flavorText: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.

abilities.name: Shed Skin

moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.flavorText: Sand is hurled in the target’s face, reducing the target’s accuracy.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.flavorText: Sand is hurled in the target’s face, reducing the target’s accuracy.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

moves.name: Gust
moves.flavorText: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.flavorText: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.flavorText: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
moves.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

moves.name: Twister
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Feather Dance
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

moves.name: Agility
moves.flavorText: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.

moves.name: Wing Attack
moves.flavorText: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Roost
moves.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

moves.name: Tailwind
moves.effect: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

moves.name: Mirror Move
moves.flavorText: The user counters the target by mimicking the target’s last move.
moves.effect: Uses the target's last used move.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Hurricane
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

name: Pidgeot
flavorText: This Pokémon has a dazzling plumage of beautifully glossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by the striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling them to choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.flavorText: Keen eyes prevent other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon’s accuracy.
abilities.shortEffect: Prevents accuracy from being lowered.
effect: This Pokémon cannot have its accuracy lowered.

This ability does not prevent any accuracy losses other than stat modifiers, such as the accuracy cut from fog; nor does it prevent other Pokémon's evasion from making this Pokémon's moves less accurate.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative accuracy modifiers through heart-swap.
Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any random encounter with a Pokémon five or more levels lower than it has a 50% chance of being skipped.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.flavorText: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.
abilities.shortEffect: Doubles evasion when confused.
effect: When this Pokémon is confused, it has twice its evasion.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.flavorText: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.
abilities.shortEffect: Protects against Defense drops.
effect: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon.
This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart-swap or guard-swap.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Confide
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

moves.name: Work Up
moves.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

moves.name: Round
moves.effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

moves.name: Fly
moves.flavorText: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn.
moves.effect: User flies high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

moves.name: Giga Impact
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: U-turn
moves.effect: User must switch out after attacking.

moves.name: Roost
moves.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.effect: Never misses.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.effect: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Thief
moves.flavorText: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.
moves.effect: Takes the target's item.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Steel Wing
moves.flavorText: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

name: Rattata
flavorText: Its incisors grow continuously throughout its life. If its incisors get too long, this Pokémon becomes unable to eat, and it starves to death.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.flavorText: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
abilities.shortEffect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.
effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.flavorText: It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat.
abilities.shortEffect: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
effect: Whenever this Pokémon is asleep, burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, it has 1.5× its Attack.  This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Attack cut from a burn.
This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.flavorText: N/A
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.
effect: This Pokémon's physical moves do 1.5× as much regular damage, but have 0.8× their usual accuracy.
Special moves are unaffected.  Moves that do set damage, such as seismic-toss, have their accuracy affected, but not their damage.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.

moves.flavorText: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.flavorText: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Counter
moves.flavorText: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.
moves.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.flavorText: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.flavorText: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.
moves.effect: Paralyzes the target.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.flavorText: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.flavorText: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

moves.effect: Takes the target's item.

moves.flavorText: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.flavorText: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
moves.effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.

moves.effect: Uses the target's move against it before it attacks, with power increased by half.

moves.effect: User must switch out after attacking.

moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.effect: Forced to use this move for several turns.  Pokémon cannot fall asleep in that time.

moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.effect: For the next few turns, the target can only use damaging moves.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.effect: Inflicts double damage if the user takes damage before attacking this turn.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.flavorText: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.flavorText: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.
moves.effect: Increases the user's chance to score a critical hit.

moves.name: Bite
moves.flavorText: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.effect: Has double power against, and can hit, Pokémon attempting to switch out.

moves.name: Hyper Fang
moves.flavorText: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.effect: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.effect: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

moves.name: Super Fang
moves.flavorText: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
moves.effect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target's HP.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.effect: Lowers the target's HP to equal the user's.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.effect: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

moves.name: Super Fang
moves.flavorText: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
moves.effect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target's HP.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.effect: Lowers the target's HP to equal the user's.
